data.eml:eml: The subgenus Pentapedilum Kieffer (Diptera: Chironomidae) in the Yaeyama Islands, the Ryukyus, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yamamoto, Nao, Hirowatari, Toshiya, Yamamoto, Masaru (2012): The subgenus Pentapedilum Kieffer (Diptera: Chironomidae) in the Yaeyama Islands, the Ryukyus, Japan. Zootaxa 3191: 33-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214547
